scripts.start: (cd server && npm start) & (cd client && npm start)
scripts.start:dev: cd client && npm install && npm start && cd ../server && npm install && npm start:dev
scripts.start:debug: cd client && npm install && npm start && cd ../server && npm install && npm start:debug
scripts.build: (cd client && npm install && npm run build) & (cd server && npm install && npm run build)
scripts.postinstall: (cd client && npm install && npm run build) & (cd server && npm install && npm run build)
